Detailed Description

sac class. Used in operations related to SAC data.

string sac::formattedString ( int  number,
int  digits 
) [private]

Takes the number and number of digits as input. If it is necessary, it adds some zeros to the left side of the number to make the number appear as the desired number of digits and returns the formatted output as string.
